testcase.name: validate if the emails in the comments are properly formatted
testcase.system-out: Given that I search for the username "Delphine".............................passed When I use the id fetched to search for the posts written by the user.......passed Then I validate if the emails in the comment section are in the proper format.passed

testcase.name: validate the username search by an inexistent user
testcase.system-out: When I search for a inexistent username "inexistentUser"....................passed Then I receive an empty body response.......................................passed

testcase.name: validate the post search by an inexistent user id
testcase.system-out: When I use an inexistent user id to search for the posts....................passed Then I receive an empty body response.......................................passed

testcase.name: validate the post comment search by an inexistent post id
